description:
The interview was recorded on May 29, 2004 with ʻAmshah Maḥmūd al-Biqāʻī, female, born in 1927 in Mughr al-Khayṭ, Palestine.

السيرة: سجلت المقابلة مع عمشة محمود البقاعي في 29 أيار مايو عام 2004، أنثى، ولدت عام 1927 في مغر الخيط، فلسطين.
contents: Agricultural life in the village. (@ 0:00)||Ceremonies and community life in the village. (@ 14:24)||Political turmoil during the British rule. (@ 22:13)||Expulsion from Palestine (@ 28:30)

description:
The interview was recorded on April 10, 2004 with ʻAbdullāh Ḥusayn, male, born in 1920 in Mughr al-Khayṭ, Palestine. He was a police officer.

السيرة: سجلت المقابلة مع عبدلله حسين في 10 نيسان ابريل عام 2004، ذكر، ولد عام 1920 في مغرالخيط، فلسطين. كان ضابطاً في البوليس.
contents:
Childhood in Mughr al-Khayṭ . (@ 0:00)||Employment and economic conditions in the village
. (@ 5:0)||Social life in Mughr al-Khayṭ . (@ 20:31)||Community life in the village. (@ 41:50)||Palestine during the Arab Revolt, 1936-1939. (@ 50:24)||Zionist infiltration and military occupation. (@ 55:50)||Zionist occupation and the expulsion to Lebanon. (@ 74:51)

description:
The interview was recorded on April 10, 2004 with Ibrāhīm Khalīl Biqāʻī, male, born in 1930 in al-Wayzīyah, Palestine.

السيرة: سجلت المقابلة مع إبراهيم خليل بقاعي في 10 نيسان أبريل، ذكر، ولد عام 1930 في الويزيّة، فلسطين.
contents: Childhood, education, and cultural life. (@ 0:00)||Social conditions and community life . (@ 13:24)||Harassment of Mughr al-Khayṭ during the Arab revolt. (@ 32:18)||Battles and war events . (@ 37:6)||British Army withdrawal and Zionist occupation. (@ 57:1)||Expulsion from Mughr al-Khayṭ. (@ 64:51)

description:
The interview was recorded on June 23, 1997 with Muḥammad Ibrāhīm Barakah, male, born in 1923 in Mughr al-Khayṭ, Palestine and resides in Nahr al-Bārid (Palestinian refugee camp: Lebanon), Lebanon.

السيرة: سجلت المقابلة مع محمد ابراهيم بركة في 23 حزيران يونيو عام 1997، ذكر ولد عام 1923 في مغر الخيط، فلسطين ويقيم في مخيم نهر البارد للاجئين الفلسطينيين، لبنان.
contents: History of Nakba. (@ 0:04)||Political activity in Palestine during the British rule. (@ 14:48)||Battles and military occupation. (@ 21:55)||War time and military occupation. (@ 43:21)||Violence, battles and exile. (@ 53:49)||Refugee life in Lebanon. (@ 76:29)

description:
The interview was recorded on January 7, 1997 with Khaznah Muḥammad ʻUlayyān, female, born in 1921 in Mughr al-Khayṭ, Palestine.

السيرة: سجلت المقابلة مع خزنة محمد عليان في 7 كانون الثاني يناير 1997، أنثى، ولدت عام 1921 في مغر الخيط، فلسطين.
contents: Rural life in Palestine before Nakba. (@ 0:00)||Socio-political dynamics in the village. (@ 13:17)||Political life during the British Mandate. (@ 24:11)||Occupation and exile. (@ 34:35)||Refugee life in Lebanon. (@ 50:41)
